text: “Lowetsa dzanja lako m’thumba mwako (palisani la mkanjo wako), lituluka lili loyera, popanda choipa. Ukachita mantha, fumbata dzanja lako chakukhwapa; (ukatero mantha akuchokera). Izi zidzakhala zizindikiro ziwiri zochokera kwa Mbuye wako kwa Farawo ndi nduna zake. Ndithu iwo ndianthu olakwa.”
